# Bash Script Directives

## Template Base

```bash
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# Cores

YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m'

# Helpers
print_info()    { echo -e "${CYAN}$1${NC}"; }
print_success() { echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ $1${NC}"; }
print_warning() { echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è $1${NC}"; }
print_error()   { echo -e "${RED}‚ùå $1${NC}"; }

# Diret√≥rio do script
SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
```

## Padr√µes de Idempot√™ncia

```bash
# Verificar comando existe
if ! command -v tool &>/dev/null; then
    # instalar
fi

# Verificar arquivo existe
if [[ ! -f "$path" ]]; then
    # criar
fi

# Verificar diret√≥rio existe
if [[ ! -d "$path" ]]; then
    mkdir -p "$path"
fi
```

## Argumentos Interativos

```bash
param="${1:-}"

if [[ -z "$param" ]]; then
    read -p "üìù Digite valor: " param
fi
```

## Tratamento de Erros

```bash
# Com trap
trap 'print_error "Erro na linha $LINENO"; exit 1' ERR

# Ou manual
if ! some_command; then
    print_error "Falhou ao executar"
    exit 1
fi
```

## Estrutura Main

```bash

    check_prerequisites
    install_tool
    configure
    verify
}

main "$@"
```

## Detec√ß√£o de OS

    case "$(uname -s)" in
        Linux*)  echo "linux" ;;
